languages.text: {n}Вы произносите слова, что бессчетное число раз гремели {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Ministorum}из ваших уст{/d} под сводами соборов, а Мейв внимает с благоговением и ужасом.{/n} "Что же это, и Башни нет, и судьба предопределена? Простите, госпо{mf|дин|жа}, если вы так говорите, то так и есть. Я переучусь молиться и веровать по-новому, клянусь!"

{n}You speak the words that have sounded countless times from {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Ministorum}your lips{/d}, echoing off the walls of cathedrals, and Maive listens in fright and awe.{/n} "Could it really be true? There is no Tower, and all people's destinies are preordained? Forgive me, my {mf|lord|lady} — if you say so, then it is the truth. I will relearn how to pray and believe, I swear!"
languages.original_text: {n}Вы произносите слова, что бессчетное число раз гремели {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Ministorum}из ваших уст{/d} под сводами соборов, а Мейв внимает с благоговением и ужасом.{/n} "Что же это, и Башни нет, и судьба предопределена? Простите, госпо{mf|дин|жа}, если вы так говорите, то так и есть. Я переучусь молиться и веровать по-новому, клянусь!"

There is no Tower, and all people's destinies are preordained? Forgive me, my {mf|lord|lady} — if you say so, then it is the truth. I will relearn how to pray and believe, I swear!"

languages.text: {n}Du sprichst die Worte, die schon unzählige Male {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Ministorum}deine Lippen{/d} verlassen haben, widerhallend von den Mauern von Kathedralen, und Maive lauscht voller Angst und Ehrfurcht.{/n} "Kann das wirklich wahr sein? Es gibt keinen Turm, und das Schicksal aller Menschen ist vorherbestimmt? Vergebt mir, {mf|Herr|Herrin} – wenn ihr es sagt, muss es wahr sein. Ich werde erneut lernen, wie man betet und glaubt, das schwöre ich!"
languages.original_text: {n}You speak the words that have sounded countless times from {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Ministorum}your lips{/d}, echoing off the walls of cathedrals, and Maive listens in fright and awe.{/n} "Could it really be true? There is no Tower, and all people's destinies are preordained? Forgive me, my {mf|lord|lady} — if you say so, then it is the truth. I will relearn how to pray and believe, I swear!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Du sprichst die Worte, die schon unzählige Male {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Ministorum}deine Lippen{/d} verlassen haben, widerhallend von den Mauern von Kathedralen, und Maive lauscht voller Angst und Ehrfurcht.{/n} "Kann das wirklich wahr sein? Es gibt keinen Turm, und das Schicksal aller Menschen ist vorherbestimmt? Vergebt mir, {mf|Herr|Herrin} – wenn ihr es sagt, muss es wahr sein. Ich werde erneut lernen, wie man betet und glaubt, das schwöre ich!"

languages.text: {n}Vous prononcez les paroles familières, qui ont déjà franchi {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Ministorum}vos lèvres{/d} et résonné des centaines de fois entre les murs de cathédrales, et Maive vous écoute avec un respect mêlé de crainte.{/n} « Alors, c'est vrai ? Il n'y a donc pas de Tour, et notre destin à tous est prédéterminé ? Pardonnez-moi, {mf|mon seigneur|ma dame}... si vous le dites, alors c'est forcément la vérité. Je vais m'empresser de réapprendre à prier et à croire comme il se doit, vous avez ma parole ! »
languages.original_text: {n}You speak the words that have sounded countless times from {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Ministorum}your lips{/d}, echoing off the walls of cathedrals, and Maive listens in fright and awe.{/n} "Could it really be true? There is no Tower, and all people's destinies are preordained? Forgive me, my {mf|lord|lady} — if you say so, then it is the truth. I will relearn how to pray and believe, I swear!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Vous prononcez les paroles familières, qui ont déjà franchi {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Ministorum}vos lèvres{/d} et résonné des centaines de fois entre les murs de cathédrales, et Maive vous écoute avec un respect mêlé de crainte.{/n} « Alors, c'est vrai ? Il n'y a donc pas de Tour, et notre destin à tous est prédéterminé ? Pardonnez-moi, {mf|mon seigneur|ma dame}... si vous le dites, alors c'est forcément la vérité. Je vais m'empresser de réapprendre à prier et à croire comme il se doit, vous avez ma parole ! »

languages.text: {n}你重复着{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Ministorum}曾经说过无数次的话语{/d}，这些话语曾回荡在大教堂的高墙之中。梅芙聆听着你的布道，充满了惊恐与敬畏。{/n}“您说的都是真的吗？根本没有什么高塔？所有人的命运都是早已注定的？请原谅，大人，既然您这么说，那这肯定是真的。我发誓，我会重新学习关于祈祷和信仰的一切！”
languages.original_text: {n}You speak the words that have sounded countless times from {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Ministorum}your lips{/d}, echoing off the walls of cathedrals, and Maive listens in fright and awe.{/n} "Could it really be true? There is no Tower, and all people's destinies are preordained? Forgive me, my {mf|lord|lady} — if you say so, then it is the truth. I will relearn how to pray and believe, I swear!"

traits.locale_text: {n}你重复着{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Ministorum}曾经说过无数次的话语{/d}，这些话语曾回荡在大教堂的高墙之中。梅芙聆听着你的布道，充满了惊恐与敬畏。{/n}“您说的都是真的吗？根本没有什么高塔？所有人的命运都是早已注定的？请原谅，大人，既然您这么说，那这肯定是真的。我发誓，我会重新学习关于祈祷和信仰的一切！”

languages.text: {n}Repites las palabras que has pronunciado {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Ministorum}innumerables veces{/d}, creando ecos en las paredes de las catedrales, y Maive escucha con tanto miedo como admiración.{/n} «¿Es cierto? ¿La Torre no existe y el destino de todas las personas está escrito? Lo siento, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Si usted lo dice, es la verdad. ¡Aprenderé a rezar y a creer como es debido, lo juro!».
languages.original_text: {n}You speak the words that have sounded countless times from {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Ministorum}your lips{/d}, echoing off the walls of cathedrals, and Maive listens in fright and awe.{/n} "Could it really be true? There is no Tower, and all people's destinies are preordained? Forgive me, my {mf|lord|lady} — if you say so, then it is the truth. I will relearn how to pray and believe, I swear!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Repites las palabras que has pronunciado {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Ministorum}innumerables veces{/d}, creando ecos en las paredes de las catedrales, y Maive escucha con tanto miedo como admiración.{/n} «¿Es cierto? ¿La Torre no existe y el destino de todas las personas está escrito? Lo siento, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Si usted lo dice, es la verdad. ¡Aprenderé a rezar y a creer como es debido, lo juro!».

languages.text: {n}{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Ministorum}あなたの唇{/d}から無数に紡がれてきた言葉が、大聖堂の壁に響き渡る。メイヴは畏怖と恐怖を込めて耳を傾けている。{/n}「本当にそうなのでしょうか？塔など存在せず、すべての人々の運命は予め定められているのでしょうか？お許しください、天の{mf|君|姫}。あなたがそうおっしゃるなら、それが真実なのでしょう。祈り方も信仰の仕方も、もう一度学び直しますことを誓います！」
languages.original_text: {n}You speak the words that have sounded countless times from {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Ministorum}your lips{/d}, echoing off the walls of cathedrals, and Maive listens in fright and awe.{/n} "Could it really be true? There is no Tower, and all people's destinies are preordained? Forgive me, my {mf|lord|lady} — if you say so, then it is the truth. I will relearn how to pray and believe, I swear!"

traits.locale_text: {n}{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Ministorum}あなたの唇{/d}から無数に紡がれてきた言葉が、大聖堂の壁に響き渡る。メイヴは畏怖と恐怖を込めて耳を傾けている。{/n}「本当にそうなのでしょうか？塔など存在せず、すべての人々の運命は予め定められているのでしょうか？お許しください、天の{mf|君|姫}。あなたがそうおっしゃるなら、それが真実なのでしょう。祈り方も信仰の仕方も、もう一度学び直しますことを誓います！」

languages.text: {n}Bugüne dek sayısız kez söylediğin o sözler, bir kez daha {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Ministorum}dudaklarından{/d} dökülerek katedralin duvarlarından yankılanıyor. Maive ise hem korku hem de hayranlıkla dinliyor.{/n} "Bu gerçekten doğru olabilir mi? Kule yok ve tüm insanların kaderi çoktan belirlendi mi yani? Affedin beni {mf|lordum|leydim}, siz öyle diyorsanız doğrudur elbette. Size yemin ederim ki dua etmeyi ve inanmayı yeniden öğreneceğim!"
languages.original_text: {n}You speak the words that have sounded countless times from {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Ministorum}your lips{/d}, echoing off the walls of cathedrals, and Maive listens in fright and awe.{/n} "Could it really be true? There is no Tower, and all people's destinies are preordained? Forgive me, my {mf|lord|lady} — if you say so, then it is the truth. I will relearn how to pray and believe, I swear!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Bugüne dek sayısız kez söylediğin o sözler bir kez daha {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Ministorum}dudaklarından{/d} dökülerek katedralin duvarlarından yankılanıyor ve Maive ise hem korku hem de hayranlıkla dinliyor.{/n} "Bu gerçekten doğru olabilir mi? Kule yok ve tüm insanların kaderi çoktan belirlendi mi yani? Affedin beni {mf|lordum|leydim}, siz öyle diyorsanız doğrudur elbette. Size yemin ederim ki dua etmeyi ve inanmayı yeniden öğreneceğim!"
